00014 class seqgen
00015 {
00016   int n;
00017 public:
00018   seqgen(int first): n(first) { }
00019   int operator() ()
00020   {
00021     return n++;
00022   }
00023 };
00024 
00025 class quant
00026 {
00027   double d;
00028 public:
00029   quant(double dd): d(dd) { }
00030   coord_type operator() (const coord_type& q) const
00031   {
00032     coord_type p;
00033     p.xcoord = d * int(q.xcoord / d + 0.5);
00034     p.ycoord = d * int(q.ycoord / d + 0.5);
00035     return p;
00036   }
00037 };
00038 
00039 std::istream& operator >> (std::istream& in, coord_type& p)
00040 {
00041   std::string line;
00042   if (std::getline(in, line))
00043   {
00044     std::istringstream rec(line);
00045     rec >> p.xcoord >> p.ycoord;
00046   }
00047   return in;
00048 }
00049 
00050 std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& out, const coord_type& p)
00051 {
00052   return (out << p.xcoord << ' ' << p.ycoord);
00053 }
00054 
00055 void main()
00056 {
00057   std::ifstream in("data\\samples.txt");
00058   vertex_type ver;
00059   std::copy(std::istream_iterator<coord_type>(in), \
00060     std::istream_iterator<coord_type>(), std::back_inserter(ver));
00061 
00062   std::transform(ver.begin(), ver.end(), ver.begin(), quant(1.0));
00063 
00064   typedef std::vector<int> int_vector;
00065   int_vector data(ver.size());
00066   std::generate(data.begin(), data.end(), seqgen(0));
00067 
00068   vertex_type dict;
00069   lexord(ver, data.size(), &data[0], dict);
00070 
00071   curve_type acc(dict.size()), hull;
00072   std::generate(acc.begin(), acc.end(), seqgen(0));
00073   graham_scan(dict, acc, hull);
00074 
00075   std::ofstream post("z1.txt");
00076   std::copy(dict.begin(), dict.end(), std::ostream_iterator<coord_type>(post, "\n"));
00077 
00078   std::ofstream blank("z1.bln");
00079   blank << hull.size() << ",1\n";
00080   for (curve_type::iterator c = hull.begin(); c != hull.end(); ++c)
00081   {
00082     blank << dict[*c] << '\n';
00083   }
00084 
00085 }
